Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: debug_listener
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This is a simple widget to capture any data it receives. It will display any data received through its endpoint in the UI (as-is). It is designed as a simple UI-based method for development and diagnosis purposes.

InputEndpoint.name: data
InputEndpoint.label: Data
InputEndpoint.doc:Documentation: This endpoint will listen for any sort of activation from connected widgets. Whenever an activation occurs, the event and accompanying data will be forwarded to the widget's interface.
